mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_num, pd_num, user_id, subject, content) values((select nextval('QNA_SEQ') FROM DUAL),#{pd_num},#{user_id}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: update qna set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where qna_num=#{qna_num} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from qna where qna_num=#{qna_num} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna WHERE pd_num=#{pd_num} order by writedate desc LIMIT #{pdto.startNum}, #{pdto.endNum}
